alt_txt: A white UF logo on a blue background
desc: Build a retrieval-augmented generation chat feature with Python, PostgreSQL, and Nvidia NIM APIs that leverages LLMs to quickly and accurately answer student questions about course-specific information.
Utilize GitHub Actions to automate unit testing with pytest and deployment to a Linux server.

alt_txt: A white UF logo on a blue background
desc: Maintained a Discord bot with a 92% approval rate used by over 1500 students in 7 UF courses.
Developed the bot in Python with the discord.py API to automate course processes such as office hours.
Managed a PostgreSQL database to efficiently store and query course-related data.

alt_txt: A white gator head on a light blue background
desc: Create, coordinate, and lead weekly technical workshops that teach software engineering skills to undergraduate students.

alt_txt: An F and M on a teal background
desc: Contribute to research on downscaling climate data to approximately 20x higher resolutions to improve crop yield predictions utilizing deep convolutional neural networks written with Python and PyTorch on the CUDA platform.
Generate visualizations of meteorological data with cartopy to assess the accuracy of various models.

alt_txt: A yellow cartoon robot with gears on its body
desc: Educated and mentored middle school students in the fundamentals of web and mobile application development.

alt_txt: A drawing of a red and green neon sign of the phrase 'Open Source'
desc: Contribute to manim-data-structures, a plugin for the Manim math animation library to add support for animating data structures.

alt_txt: A white omega with a balloon in the center on a red-brown background
desc: Silver medalist in 2022 ICPC Southeast USA Regional.
Apply knowledge of data structures and algorithms to solve programming problems under time pressure while communicating in a team of 3 to solve problems collaboratively.

desc: Worked in a team to collaboratively develop a functional and responsive website with React that educated viewers on climate change and provided information on attending the 2022 Miami Youth Climate Summit
